19681.<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「お:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Hey, Medde, do you remember where you
put the old one of the villager list?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19682.<start_lip_sync n00409 _normal m00001>「あ:
<start_lip_sync n00409 _normal m00001>Oh, no? Didn't we throw out the old
ones, over 50 years ago, a long time
ago?<stop_lip_animation n00409 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19683.<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>That's right! I forgot that I sent
Hyuza's guy to throw it out.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19684.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p:
Hmmm. The clue to this case was about to be buried in the dark by the chief. Even so, I don't think chief is the
culprit.

19685.<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「お:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Oh, Rubecca. Playing detective, are
you?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19686.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>Father Chief Setorii, will you tell me
where you dumped that list of
villagers?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19687.<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「う:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Hmmm. I think Hyuza told me to throw
it away on my way to Forgetten Cave in
Lenam Fields.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19688.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>Hmmm. I see. So that's how it is.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19689.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「こ: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>This is true!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19690.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p:
My guess is that Hyuza, who is surprisingly disciplined, dumped the villager list in the cave as he was
told to do!

19691.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p:
Did you hear that ? I just found out that an important clue in the Dahlia case is lying dormant in
the cave!

19692.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>From here, it's the assistant's job. I
do the thinking. You do the physical
labor. This is the most efficient way.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19693.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>I'll wait here. Go check out Forgetten
Cave in Lenam Fields.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19694.魔物が 地面から 何かを掘りだしたようだ。:
Looks like monster has dug something
out of the ground.

19697.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>Let's see. Hmm. I see. I see.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19698.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「ダ:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>I found Dahlia's name! And her groom,
Reg, is on the list too.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19699.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「ふ:
Their relationship is described as husband and wife. So we're pretty sure this is a list of names made just
before the wedding.

19701.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「ほ:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>You see, these days. It looks like one

19702.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「名:

19703.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「１: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>10 year old girl.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19705.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「あ:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Oh, sorry for spacing out. Thanks to

19706.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「で:
